https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7yxCUZBxIVOG8CEZ8O9zW4u9Fju.jpg Anna is an accountant for an important insurance firm and lives with her longterm lover Alessio - a man who longs for a stable longterm relationship with children, home, etc. Anna, feeling as though the fire has fizzled in that relationship takes up with co-worker Domenico and the two begin a passionate affair. Come Undone
